Package com.atakmap.android.maps

Interface CenterPointControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSheet, DrawingCircle, DrawingEllipse, DrawingRectangle, DrawingShape, EditablePolyline, FloatingPointRoute, MultiPolyline, RangeCircle, Rectangle, Route, RouteTrackWrapper, RubberImage, RubberModel, VehicleModel, VehicleShape
    public interface CenterPointControl
    A Shape that has the ability to toggle the center point

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isCenterPointLabelVisible()
      Gets the center point label visibility.
      boolean isCenterPointVisible()
      Returns the current state of the center point marker visibility
      void setCenterPointLabelVisible​(boolean visible)
      Set the center point label visibility Please note that this does not toggle the center label if the center marker is non-default
      void setCenterPointVisible​(boolean visible)
      Allow for toggling the visibility of the center point marker.

    • Method Detail

      • isCenterPointVisible

        boolean isCenterPointVisible()
        Returns the current state of the center point marker visibility
        Returns:
        true if it is visible when the shape is visible

      • setCenterPointVisible

        void setCenterPointVisible​(boolean visible)
        Allow for toggling the visibility of the center point marker. Please note that this does not toggle the center marker if the center marker is non-default
        Parameters:
        visible - true if the center point should be drawn when the shape is visible

      • isCenterPointLabelVisible

        boolean isCenterPointLabelVisible()
        Gets the center point label visibility.

      • setCenterPointLabelVisible

        void setCenterPointLabelVisible​(boolean visible)
        Set the center point label visibility Please note that this does not toggle the center label if the center marker is non-default
        Parameters:
        visible - true if the center point label should be drawn when the shape is visible
